verbose_text: The hyaluronic acid coating facilitated the accumulation of CuS nanoparticle in the tumor through both the EPR effect and hyaluronic acid-CD44 affinity based active targeting, resulting in improved PA contrast and enhanced PTT efficacy without causing systemic toxicity to the major organs.
evidence: hyaluronic acid coating facilitated the accumulation of CuS nanoparticle in the tumor through both the EPR effect and hyaluronic acid-CD44 affinity-based active targeting, resulting in improved PA contrast and enhanced PTT
